item.description: Tufts CSDD Executive Forum: Designing and Maintaining Successful Innovation Partnerships When: Thursday, September 15th, 2011 Where: British Consulate-General, One Broadway, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, USA Website & Registration: http://csdd.tufts.edu/courses/executive_forum Partnerships, co-development agreements, and collaborations are rapidly becoming the new face of pharmaceutical innovation. Transformational strategies, including the creation of novel entities such as Enlight Biosciences and Massachusetts Life Sciences Center highlight industry’s efforts to leverage the strengths and core competencies of key stakeholders in innovation. This roundtable will explore these models, as well as factors associated with successful industry-academic partnerships.
item.name: Designing and Maintaining Successful Innovation Partnerships
